rows.label: tlk70000154_01_msg0001
rows.name:
Gororo still worries if
Kurogane taking job of scouting
out Drivers seriously...

rows.label: tlk70000154_01_msg0002
rows.name:
Ah, should explain. Kurogane
is Blade of Gororo.

rows.label: tlk70000154_01_msg0003
rows.name:
Even for veteran warrior like self,
trusting partner 100% when partner
far away is not easy thing.

rows.label: tlk70000154_01_msg0004
rows.name:
This reaffirm old Driver-and-Blade
wisdom that stay close is best way to
have strong bond between partners!
